documentation.text:
@title Proxy
 @dev Implements delegation of calls to other contracts, with proper
 forwarding of return values and bubbling of failures.
 It defines a fallback function that delegates all calls to the address
 returned by the abstract _implementation() internal function.
So, the fallback function first invokes willFallback which doesn't have any functionality. It is
up to the developer to add functionality, if desired, in a derived contract.
Then, it invokes the delegate function with the implementation function as an argument. The implementation
function returns the address of the implementation (logic) contract. Then the delegate function takes the 
data from the transaction that was sent by the dapp via web3.js. The transaction will not invoke any
functions and will only have data (i.e. function call for the implementation contract)in the data field.

@dev Fallback function that delegates calls to the address returned by `_implementation()`. Will run if call data
 is empty.

@dev fallback implementation.
 Extracted to enable manual triggering.

devdoc.details: Implements delegation of calls to other contracts, with proper forwarding of return values and bubbling of failures. It defines a fallback function that delegates all calls to the address returned by the abstract _implementation() internal function. So, the fallback function first invokes willFallback which doesn't have any functionality. It is up to the developer to add functionality, if desired, in a derived contract. Then, it invokes the delegate function with the implementation function as an argument. The implementation function returns the address of the implementation (logic) contract. Then the delegate function takes the  data from the transaction that was sent by the dapp via web3.js. The transaction will not invoke any functions and will only have data (i.e. function call for the implementation contract)in the data field.
devdoc.title: Proxy
